com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr.impl

Class SimpleSessionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr.impl.SimpleSessionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SessionFactory

    public final class SimpleSessionFactory
extends Object
implements SessionFactory
    A simple session factory that does not preform any session pooling.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews

        public javax.jcr.Session getSession(String workspaceName)
                             throws Exception
        Get a session by logging into the repository using the global credentials.
        Specified by:
        getSession in interface SessionFactory
        Parameters:
        workspaceName - The workspace name. If null then the default workspace is used.
